org.team4159.boths.views

Class BroadcastWebSocketView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team4159.boths.View
      • org.team4159.boths.views.BaseWebSocketView
        • org.team4159.boths.views.BroadcastWebSocketView

  • public class BroadcastWebSocketView
extends BaseWebSocketView
    This class allows for messages to be broadcasted to all WebSocket connections currently connected to this view.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.team4159.boths.views.BaseWebSocketView

      • postResponse

        public void postResponse(Request req,
                Response res,
                java.io.InputStream is,
                java.io.OutputStream os)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: View
        Optionally continues handling the request after a response from View.getResponse(Request, Route) has been sent to the client. The default implementation does nothing.
        Overrides:
        postResponse in class View
        Parameters:
        req - The Request object of the initial request.
        res - The Response object as returned by View.getResponse(Request, Route).
        is - The raw InputStream of the socket.
        os - The raw OutputStream of the socket.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
